subject: Re: [junit] Testing J2EEDelegate
msgSnippet: ... Axis appears not to want to be initialized twice in the same JVM. In my opinion, Axis has a bug. They likely would not agree with that assessment. You may
messageBody:
>So said Fernando on 2003-07-21 --------------------
>Hi,
>I have the class test:
--------
>
>The textual test runner is working fine, but when I run the graphical
>test runner this error occurs:
>
>---------
>java.lang.NullPointerException
> at
>org.apache.axis.client.Service.getEngineConfiguration(Service.java:801)
> at org.apache.axis.client.Service.getAxisClient(Service.java:143)
> at org.apache.axis.client.Service.<init>(Service.java:152)
> at com.smartprice.j2ee.J2EEDelegateServiceLocator.<init>(Unknown
> Source)
> at TestJ2EEDelegate.setUp(Unknown Source)
>----------
>
>What's wrong?

Axis appears not to want to be initialized twice in the same JVM. In my opinion, Axis has a bug. They likely would not agree with that assessment.

You may need to change your tests (or production code!) so that Axis is not initialized more than once while the application is running.

Good luck.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
